page.title: 02Employment:Glenalmond Coll.
page.content: {Labourforce}consists of six men who work all year round. They work to a { {basic routine}each day,cutting grass in summer,lining the rugby and hockey pitches and painting rugby posts in winter. They are traditionally known as{ {Cameronians}but the name has been forgotten by most over the years. They are not affected by school life or rules and have nothing to do with the religious side of the College. {Cleaning ladies}are employed in the College, all from local towns like Methven, Harrietfield and Perth. They work for most of the year and clean up rooms after the end of the school term.
